mods.abstract: $100 Reward. RANAWAY from the plantation of the subscriber, in the Parish of Natchitoches, on the night of the 26th May, a negro-boy named WILLIAM ; dark mulatto, aged about 35 years, stout built, bow-legged, and 5 feet 6 inches in height. He has a scar on the first knuckle of the fore-finger of the right hand, caused by a cut with a spade, the wound of which was not cured at the time he ran off. He has rather an effeminate voice, and when addressed, and when addressed, speaks very fast. The night on which he ran off, he killed a negro-man, named Frank, also belonging to me. If arrested out of the Parish of Natchitoches and lodged in the jail of said Parish. I will pay the reward of One Hundred Dollars.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
